faq.howLongRepair: How long does pipe repair take?
faq.howLongRepairAnswer: Most repairs are completed within 2 hours.
faq.isGuaranteed: Do you offer a service guarantee?
faq.isGuaranteedAnswer: Yes, we offer a 12-month guarantee on all services.
faq.howLongCleaning: How long does drain cleaning take?
faq.howLongCleaningAnswer: Drain cleaning usually takes between 30 minutes and 1 hour.
faq.howFastEmergency: How fast can an emergency plumber arrive?
faq.howFastEmergencyAnswer: Our emergency plumber arrives within 60 minutes.
faq.howLongPipeReplacement: How long does pipe replacement take?
faq.howLongPipeReplacementAnswer: Pipe replacement is usually completed in one day.
faq.howLongPipeRepair: How long does pipe repair take?
faq.howLongPipeRepairAnswer: Minor repairs can be completed in as little as 1 hour.
